org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class HeuristicAdjustment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.HeuristicAdjustment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HeuristicAdjustment
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    HeuristicAdjustment class implements a message with heuristic information about landmarks to properly adjust the landmarks heuristic in multi-agent planning.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
